summary: Conan the Cimmerian - Nord Male saves, batch file, and screenshots
descriptionHtml:
Description:
-------------

My interpretaion of Robert E. Howard\'s Conan. He is not an Arnold or a Momoa clone (there are already files on the site for those if you prefer).
 
His look is derived from his description found here : http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conan_the_Barbarian

Not happy with the look, use console command \"showracemenu\" and change him up to your liking, or just don\'t download :P.

What this includes :

Game save 2 - Immediately after gaining control of your character in the tower with Raloff and Ulfric. Character will look a little different from the screenshots, got some dirt and scars on his face, but for the most part identical. This allows you to choose your path, Imperial or Stormcloak.

Game save 3 - After entering Helgen Keep with Raloff (think about it, would you follow someone who was going to lop off your head ?) First 2 Imperial Guards are dead, looted their bodies, first gate locked, key in inventory, character located in the room where you would enter the keep with Hadvar. This is the character the screenshots were taken from inside the keep, face has no dirt or scars.

Conan.txt file - Included this for the Role Players. I only recommend using this if you have the difficulty cranked up, gives you permanent buffs to health, stam, carry weight, movement speed, poison and disease resistance, Imperial Luck spell from Imperials and Adrenaline Rush spell from Redguards. Base Nord stats are unchanged. Also gives you a good head start on skills, perks, and some items and gold. It\'s easy enough to take out or edit what you don\'t want to use, just go to the line entry you want to remove and delete it, or edit the value, save and exit. My explanation of this : Well IT IS Conan ! You haven\'t got to use the batch file, just dont install it. 
                 
Screenshots - 11 Screenshots taken during character creation.

Install:
-------------

Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files.

Place save file of your choice in C:\\Users\\Username\\My Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves (click \'yes to overwrite\' if needed)

Place the Conan.txt file to your Skyrim install folder where your TESV.exe file is located ex: c:\\Program files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\Common\\Skyrim (Click \'yes to overite\' if needed)
To use this open the console in game, type in \"bat Conan\" without the quotation marks, hit enter, and exit the console.

Uninstall:
---------------

Just delete the files from where you installed them. No Textures or Meshes to worry about.


To get the exact look of the character in the screenshots see mods used below listed in credits. Without those mods your character will not look like the screenshots. It will be similar, but not an exact copy.

Used mods:
-----------
Character creation:
No More Blocky Faces by Xenius - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=30
High Quality Eyes by Xenius - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=498
Younger Looking Men - Optional 2048x2048 and now for Elves by Emerj - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1804
Hair Retexture - Telthalions Finer Hair by Telthalion - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2207
Body Mesh and Texture - Nude Male with Import from Roberts new vegas male by Sundracon - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3421

Armor and Weapons seen in screenshots:
Light Imperial Bracers and Boots, Imperial Sword - Imperial Armor by Aremeta - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2492
Darkened Hide armor - Rangers Armor_Leather Replacement by rahman530 - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3994
Iron Greatsword retexture - Weapon Retexture Project WRP by Millenia - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1754
Draugr Armor - Draugr Armor replacement by Prometheus - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2794 

*** You can make the Draugr Armor Light Armor by using Omegared99\'s esp file found here : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2624 ***


Credits
-------
Thanks Bethesda for creating Skyrim !
Thanks to all the above mentioned mod authors for making my journey through Skyrim more enjoyable !
author: Badger375
